Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Congress/Central Park
ShortDescription: WB 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Kostner & Harrison: due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison: due to, street blockage near Congress/Central Park.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to police investigation.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th and Belmont at this time.

 Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Howard and Belmont in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Hollywood, Sheridan, Foster and Broadway due to street blockage near Broadway/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Hollywood, Sheridan, Foster and Broadway due to street blockage near Broadway/Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.
